text: I see you've been busy....lol Why would you post those pictures of the LGBT Community when you know Mike Pence is Gay? How rude are you to the Vice President of the United States? You really should apologize.

LGBT activist Brandon Wolf — told Reid that “homophobic psychopaths” are “running the United States government today,” and that if Vice President Mike Pence ever became president, he would put “gay people” in “concentration camps.” via @ theblazehttps://www.theblaze.com/news/2018/04/30/lgbt-activist-if-mike-pence-were-president-hed-put-gay-people-in-concentration-camps …
